stories.title: Locked in the Library

stories.author: M. Cross

stories.title: The Pool Boy's Secret
stories.excerpt: I hired him to clean the pool, but got much more...

stories.title: The Delivery
stories.excerpt: The pizza arrived late, but the delivery guy made it worth the wait...
stories.author: Jenny T.
